mapper.sql: a.project_Type, a.project_Type, a.project_Name, a.mainProject_Name, a.guanli, a.give_Date, a.give_Dept, a.startPlan_Date, a.endPlan_Date, a.buildPlace, a.guobiao, a.buildDetailPlace, a.projectAttribute, a.buildNature, a.total_Investment, a.scaleandinfo, a.siteArea, a.newSiteArea, a.farmingSiteArea, a.projectPrincipal, a.capitalSource, a.financialCapitalSource, a.isTechnically, a.putClassify, a.putCatalog, a.projectLegalDetp, a.projectLegalLicenseType, a.projectLegalLicenseNum, a.linkman, a.linktel, a.declareDate, a.projectState, a.projectCode, a.manageStatus
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_declare( id, project_Type, project_Name, mainProject_Name, guanli, give_Date, give_Dept, startPlan_Date, endPlan_Date, buildPlace, guobiao, buildDetailPlace, projectAttribute, buildNature, total_Investment, scaleandinfo, siteArea, newSiteArea, farmingSiteArea, projectPrincipal, capitalSource, financialCapitalSource, isTechnically, putClassify, putCatalog, projectLegalDetp, projectLegalLicenseType, projectLegalLicenseNum, linkman, linktel, declareDate, projectState, projectCode, manageStatus )VALUES( #{id}, #{projectType}, #{projectName}, #{mainProjectName}, #{guanli}, #{giveDate}, #{giveDept}, #{startPlanDate}, #{endPlanDate}, #{buildPlace}, #{guobiao}, #{buildDetailPlace}, #{projectAttribute}, #{buildNature}, #{totalInvestment}, #{scaleandinfo}, #{siteArea}, #{newSiteArea}, #{farmingSiteArea}, #{projectPrincipal}, #{capitalSource}, #{financialCapitalSource}, #{isTechnically}, #{putClassify}, #{putCatalog}, #{projectLegalDetp}, #{projectLegalLicenseType}, #{projectLegalLicenseNum}, #{linkman}, #{linktel}, #{declareDate}, #{projectState}, #{projectCode}, #{manageStatus} )
